issue.body:
Manifests need to be updated so the name matches the intended name, which is the name of the repo it lives in.

Any mismatch in manifest.name and the plugin repo, and we will not be able to install those plugins. The config will look like this:

This is because the worker URL contains the repo name, and we use that to match against manifest.name.
issue.question: /ask could you please provide a summary of the issue ?

issueResponses.expectedResponse: The manifest.name should match the name of the repo it lives in. This is because the worker URL contains the repo name, and we use that to match against manifest.name.
